txt.en: A Frightful Lack of Spirit

'It is horrible! Just horrible!

'I have been beset by complaints, and just a moment ago, I saw another hobbit sleeping in the field!

'Have I done something wrong? It seems that no matter what festivities I think up... I cannot impress them!

'Why don't you try to help them get in the spirit, [placeholder]? Show them what spooky fun can be had in Wistmead!
Helped hobbits celebrate in the spirit of the Harvest Festival ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Well, well! I can hear the hoots and cheers from here!

'Perhaps I was a little too hasty in my thinking....

'Thank you, [placeholder]. That will be all!'
'Goodness me! What a fright!'

Spiritless hobbits can be found throughout Wistmead.\n\nWalaric Goldworthy is concerned that hobbits visiting Wistmead are not celebrating in the proper spirit of the Harvest Festival. You should help them.
'Oh my!'
Walaric Goldworthy has become concerned that hobbits visiting Wistmead are not having fun - whether it is spooky or not!
Walaric Goldworthy can be found in Wistmead.\n\nYou have helped many hobbits rediscover the spirit of the Harvest Festival. You should return to Walaric Goldworthy.
'Oh ho! You spooked me!'
Help hobbits celebrate in the spirit of the Harvest Festival ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Misery me! You gave me quite a shock!'
'Ha! Perhaps Wistmead is spookier than I thought!'
'How dreadful! What a delight!'
'My, my! You're even scarier than the line for the maze!'
'Gracious me! Has the Fognoggin gone to my head?!'
Talk to Walaric Goldworthy
'Oh, so that's how it's going to be? I'll not be left out of the fun!'
'How abominable!'
'Whoa!'
'Oi! I didn't even hear you coming!'
'What horror! Even the hairs on my feet are standing on end!'
'Oh, fiddlesticks! You got me!'
Spirited Hobbit
